text: 1.15 Mat 3.11, Luk 3.16, Jon 1.27-32, 8.58, Kol 1.17 Pen bɨ anɨb ak takaw ak, Jon binɨb okok kɨlop agñak. Kɨles gɨl agñɨl agak, Bɨ anɨb nep nɨm, nɨbop ned agɨnek agak. Anɨgɨl agɨnek, Yad opin bɨ kɨdek ownɨgab ak, bɨlel yɨbɨl yolɨgup ak kɨdek ami yɨp tɨkak agɨnek agak. Anɨb ak ne bɨawl yɨbɨl mɨdeb, yad bɨ yokɨp agɨnek agak.
